column2: Skill required:  Property & Casualty- Underwriting - Underwriting Designation:  Underwriting Senior Manager Qualifications: Any Graduation  Years of Experience: 16+  What would you do? As a Leader, you are respected for your technical expertise and ability to oversee programs and processes. You balance the needs of multiple stakeholders, making sound decisions using data, analysis, experience, and judgment, along with a risk mindset. Ultimately, you take ownership of key outcomes.Define Insurance policy and calucating premium including terms and condition for Property. The Underwriting team focuses on raising investment capital from investors on behalf of corporations and governments that are issuing either equity or debt securities. What are we looking for? In this role, you will be responsible for the strategic planning and development of all (Region/Country) Underwriting Analyst operations and report directly to Head of Operations. You will coordinate with and guide the Underwriting Analyst Managers for all product lines and identify and design processes and controls that will drive continuous improvement. Insurance Underwriting Migration Location strategy Technology for process automation Data analytics Performance Monitoring AINS IIA CII) Green/Black Belt Process restructuring Budget planning. Insurance Certification (CPCU  Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role you are required to identify and assess complex problems for area of responsibility The person would create solutions in situations in which analysis requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors Requires adherence to strategic direction set by senior management when establishing near-term goals Interaction of the individual is with senior management at a client and/or within Accenture, involving matters that may require acceptance of an alternate approach Some latitude in decision-making in involved you will act independently to determine methods and procedures on new assignments Decisions individual at this role makes have a major day to day impact on area of responsibility The person manages large - medium sized teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts Qualification Any Graduation

column2: Job Description  Assistant Manager       Roles:   The Assistant Manager will play a pivotal role in ensuring the efficient and accurate processing   of overseas  claims, This position requires strong leadership skills, advanced proficiency in MS   Office applications, and a  comprehensive understanding of insurance regulations and market   dynamics.    Key Responsibilities:   ??Lead and supervise a team of claim processing specialists to ensure timely and accurate     handling of  overseas claims.  ??Develop and implement strategies to optimize claim processing workflows and improve     operational efficiency.  ??Generate Management Information Systems (MIS) reports.  ??Develop and implement strategies to optimize claim processing workflows, enhance    operational  efficiency, and improve the overall customer experience.  ??Oversee the end-to-end processing of travel claims, including verification of expenses,      documentation review, and approval/disapproval of claims.  ??Handle complex or sensitive claims with professionalism and empathy, striving to provide      excellent customer service and achieve satisfactory outcomes.   Knowledge, skills, and abilities:    ??8+ years experience in Travel/ Health Added advantage if he/she has travel claim related  experience.   ??claim (reimbursement/ cashless) experience.  ??Candidate should have experience in managing minimum of 5 to 10 agent team.   ??In-depth knowledge of travel insurance products, coverage types, and claims handling procedures.  ??Strong understanding of insurance regulations, compliance requirements, and industry best  practices.  ??Excellent leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire a team to  achieve goals.  ??Added advantage if has experience in working in any tech related project (e.g CRM, report tool etc)   ??Added advantage if he/she has travel claim related experience.   ??Outstanding customer service skills   ??Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively interface with all levels of clients,  customers and staff.   ??Ability to work closely with other team members and departments

column2: Analyze risk factors associated with insuring a particular property or individual such as location occupation past claims and industry trends. Use this analysis to determine the level of coverage to be provided and calculate appropriate premiums. Determine the appropriate type and amount of coverage based on individual risk profiles. This includes evaluating policy terms such as deductibles exclusions and coverage limits and making recommendations to clients accordingly. Conduct periodic audits of existing policies to ensure ongoing compliance with company guidelines and identify any changes in risk profiles that may require adjustments to coverage or premiums. Contact Person: hurshaa Contact Number: 9840044181
